casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Thomas G. Trotta (14034)

O’Connell, Landau and Hennessy, Js.

Argued May 31 decision released July 4, 1995 Julian Schlesinger, for the appellant (defendant). Jo Anne Sulik, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were James E. Thomas, state’s attorney, and Christopher Parakilas, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
